Articles.Content:
Hello there,

Just thought i should introduce myself (to some extent) before posting 'stuff' in these Forums.

KSP wise i have been playing a little while (had the game since 0.19, i think) but only really started getting into it over the past 2-3 weeks, the release of 0.90 was ideal and spurred my progress.

I am not amazingly knowledgeable on the game mechanics (i can land on the Mun/minmus, but interplanetary travels yet to be tried) so my main aim will be lurking and Learning.

Location wise, as its nice to know if there are locals, im based in Auckland (New Zealand) though i am a True Brit (from the UK). Im currently in NZ on a Working Holiday since September. Fun times.

I look forward to getting to know some of you..

Dan.

Welcome aboard!

There are many, many knowledgeable folk around here if you need a helping hand. In fact, there is a whole forum section just for that.

Have fun and don't be afraid of the explosions.
